news.title_en: ABC Chemical Researchers Successfully Pioneer Green Catalysis Method
news.title_zh: ABC化工研究人员成功开创绿色催化方法
news.summary_en: Breakthrough in sustainable manufacturing reduces industrial waste by 30%
news.summary_zh: 可持续制造突破将工业废弃物减少30%

news.title_en: Strategic Partnership with Global Logistics Firm
news.title_zh: 与全球物流公司建立战略合作
news.summary_en: Enhancing supply chain resilience for reliable global delivery
news.summary_zh: 提高供应链弹性确保全球可靠交付

news.title_en: Super Green Initiative: 20% Carbon Reduction by 2026
news.title_zh: 超级绿色倡议：2026年减少20%碳排放
news.summary_en: Company-wide commitment to renewable energy and emissions reduction
news.summary_zh: 公司范围承诺使用可再生能源和减排

news.title_en: ABC Chemical to Host Global Distributor Conference in Q1 2025
news.title_zh: ABC化工将于2025年第一季度主办全球分销商大会
news.summary_en: The company will gather partners from over 30 countries to discuss new product launches and logistics strategies for the upcoming fiscal year.
news.summary_zh: 公司将聚集来自30多个国家的合作伙伴，讨论新产品发布和下一财年的物流战略。

news.title_en: R&D Center Expansion Set to Boost Innovation Capacity
news.title_zh: 研发中心扩建，旨在提高创新能力
news.summary_en: ABC Chemical announces plans to expand its main R&D facility, adding new laboratories dedicated to high-purity material synthesis.
news.summary_zh: ABC化工宣布计划扩建其主要研发设施，新增专注于高纯度材料合成的实验室。
